content.html: no, this isn't an april fools' joke. if you're using YAML and you wished there was a proper media type for it on the internet, the wait is (almost) over: "application/yaml" to the rescue! and there even is a "+yaml" structured syntax suffix as a bonus... github.com/ietf-wg-httpap…
